column4: hmm... just noticed that my "refresh rate" is at 53mhz when it should be at 75mhz.
Is there a solution to force change the refresh rate to 75mhz?
if you are using an nvidia card, its a known bug
the listed refreshes are wrong, if you want the highest supported value, then just pick the highest listed value.  I pick 53hz, and I get something like 75hz
